card.flavor: "Lightning in a bottle? That's not where I need it."

oracleCard.name: Weaver of Lightning
oracleCard.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this creature deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

faces.flavor: Narset brought the Jeskai djinn ancient wisdom and the promise to challenge the status quo.
faces.name: Pinnacle Monk
faces.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
When this creature enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

faces.flavor:
"Fear not the fall. Fear never reaching the pinnacle."
—Narset
faces.name: Mystic Peak
faces.text:
As this land enters, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.

card.flavor: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

oracleCard.name: Lightning Bolt
oracleCard.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

edition.editionname: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

card.flavor: Not every tale ends in glory.

faces.flavor: Not every tale ends in glory.
faces.name: Bonecrusher Giant
faces.text: Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell, this creature deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.

faces.name: Stomp
faces.text: Damage can't be prevented this turn. Stomp deals 2 damage to any target.

oracleCard.name: Chandra, Dressed to Kill
oracleCard.text:
+1: Add {R}. Chandra deals 1 damage to up to one target player or planeswalker.
+1: Exile the top card of your library. If it's red, you may cast it this turn.
−7: Exile the top five cards of your library. You may cast red spells from among them this turn. You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a red spell, this emblem deals X damage to any target, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast that spell."

oracleCard.name: The Rollercrusher Ride
oracleCard.text:
Delirium — If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to a permanent or player while there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, it deals double that damage instead.
When The Rollercrusher Ride enters, it deals X damage to each of up to X target creatures.

card.flavor: A devil's hands are never idle.

oracleCard.name: Devil's Play
oracleCard.text:
Devil's Play deals X damage to any target.
Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

oracleCard.name: Light Up the Stage
oracleCard.text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

oracleCard.name: Dragon's Rage Channeler
oracleCard.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
Delirium — As long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, this creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and attacks each combat if able.

card.flavor:
"This is what glory looks like."
—Nicol Bolas

oracleCard.name: Neheb, the Eternal
oracleCard.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
At the beginning of each of your postcombat main phases, add {R} for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

card.flavor: "Decent. But let me show you what mastery looks like."

oracleCard.name: Flare of Duplication
oracleCard.text:
You may sacrifice a nontoken red creature rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

oracleCard.name: Jaya Ballard
oracleCard.text:
+1: Add {R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells.
+1: Discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards.
−8: You get an emblem with "You may cast instant and sorcery spells from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead."

card.flavor:
"Small outbursts are healthy."
—Koth of the Hammer

oracleCard.name: Lava Dart
oracleCard.text:
Lava Dart deals 1 damage to any target.
Flashback—Sacrifice a Mountain. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

oracleCard.name: Obosh, the Preypiercer
oracleCard.text:
Companion — Your starting deck contains only cards with odd mana values and land cards. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.)
If a source you control with an odd mana value would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.flavor: Chandra treasures her mentor's goggles, not for their magical properties, but for the memory of the woman who taught her to truly harness the power of fire.

oracleCard.name: Pyromancer's Goggles
oracleCard.text: {T}: Add {R}. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

faces.name: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh
faces.text:
Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra.
{T}: Chandra deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

faces.name: Chandra, Roaring Flame
faces.text:
+1: Chandra deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
−2: Chandra deals 2 damage to target creature.
−7: Chandra deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."

oracleCard.name: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh // Chandra, Roaring Flame
